sense.def:
To sharpen an object
pomeni narediti rob nečesa zelo tanek ali konico nečesa ostro.

seg.quote: Roger sharpened a stick at both ends.

sense.def:
Kadar čuti ali zmožnosti nekega človeka
sharpen
ali
are sharpened
, tisti človek začne hitreje razmišljati ali opažati stvari.

seg.quote: His eyes and instincts sharpened as he saw the fort in the distance.
Generations of urban living had sharpened their wits.

sense.def:
Kadar glas nekega človeka
sharpens
, ta začne govoriti bolj jezno ali hitreje.

seg.quote: ‘Who told you?’ Her voice had sharpened a little.
Fear and urgency sharpened Sarah's voice.
This sharpened the conflict between them.
Tension in society has increased and sharpened.
